text: Two in a Car (German: Zwei in einem Auto) is a 1932 German comedy film directed by Joe May and starring Karl Ludwig Diehl, Magda Schneider and Richard Romanowsky.Bock & Bergfelder p.514 A separate French version Companion Wanted was also released. In 1940 the film was remade at the Cinecitta studios in Rome as Two on a Vacation. The film's art direction was by Heinrich Richter and Hermann Warm. ==Cast== * Karl Ludwig Diehl as Lord Kingsdale * Magda Schneider as Lisa Krüger * Richard Romanowsky as Oberbuchhalter Broesecke * Ernö Verebes * Kurt Gerron as Agent Niedlich * Heinz Gordon as Chauffeur Meyer * Max Nadler as Gemütlicher Matthias == References == == Bibliography == * Bock, Hans-Michael & Bergfelder, Tim. The Concise Cinegraph: Encyclopaedia of German Cinema. Berghahn Books, 2009. == External links == * Category:1931 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German comedy films Category:1931 comedy films Category:German- language films Category:Films directed by Joe May Category:German multilingual films Category:Films produced by Joe May Category:Films scored by Bruno Granichstaedten Category:German black-and-white films Category:1931 multilingual films
title: Two in a Car
